common.delete_failed: Delete failed, please try again later
common.delete_warning: Cannot be recovered after deletion, confirm delete?

metadata.title: ScriptCat - Share Your Userscripts
metadata.description: ScriptCat script site, where you can share your userscripts with the world

browser_stores.download_crx_install: Download installer file for manual installation

hero.tagline: Discover and share quality userscripts to make browsing more exciting

features.why_choose_subtitle: Based on Tampermonkey's design philosophy, fully compatible with Tampermonkey scripts, providing more rich APIs to enable scripts to accomplish more powerful functions.

scriptcat.title: Powerful Script Manager
scriptcat.description: ScriptCat is fully compatible with Tampermonkey scripts while providing background script runtime framework and rich API extensions.

what_is_userscript.question: What are userscripts?
what_is_userscript.answer: Userscripts can enhance webpage functionality, remove ads, improve usability, making your browsing experience better.

why_scriptcat.question: Why choose ScriptCat?
why_scriptcat.answer: ScriptCat is not only compatible with Tampermonkey scripts, but also supports background script execution, making it more powerful with broader coverage.

how_to_start.question: How to get started?
how_to_start.answer: First install a script manager, then find suitable scripts on this site and install them with one click.

developer.title: Join Developers
developer.description: Become a script developer and enjoy exclusive benefits and technical support.

stats.title: Script Statistics
stats.description: View installation statistics and usage data of {name}

alerts.archived_description: This script has been archived by the author. The script may malfunction and the author is no longer maintaining it, so you cannot provide feedback.
alerts.obfuscated_description: This script has been obfuscated by the author. Although the script site has conducted a review, please be careful when granting dangerous permissions.

card.library_tooltip: This is a library used by scripts

crontab.monthly_first_midnight: Execute on the 1st of every month at midnight

install.install_check_failed: Failed to check script installation status

actions.prerelease_tooltip: Install prerelease version to experience new content

info.library_description: This is a library used by userscripts, you can reference it directly in your scripts.
info.background_script_desc: It runs in the browser background
info.scheduled_script_tooltip: This script supports scheduled execution and will run automatically at set intervals: {cron}

gray_control.traffic_tooltip: Will push {percent}% of traffic to target version
gray_control.weight_day_tooltip: Gradually update traffic to target value within {days} days. If you want to fully update to the specified version, set 100%, 0 days for direct update to this version

user_form.login_prompt_description: After logging in, you can rate and review scripts to help other users make choices
user_form.login_redirect_message: Please go to the login page to log in
user_form.review_help_text: Your review will help other users
user_form.review_placeholder: Share your experience to help other users understand this script...

list.title: User Reviews
list.empty_description: Be the first to review this script!

create.title_placeholder: Please briefly describe the issue you want to report
create.content_placeholder: Please describe the issue in detail, including reproduction steps, expected results, etc...

comment.watch_tooltip: Watch this feedback to receive update notifications

statistics.loading_failed_description: Failed to fetch statistics data, please try again later.
statistics.data_notice_description: The following data is for reference only, actual results may vary. UV represents unique visitors, PV represents page views.

alerts.review_rules_description: to ensure code quality and security. Non-compliant scripts will be removed or deleted.

description_section.title: Detailed Description
description_section.placeholder: Please describe the script's functionality, usage instructions, etc. in detail. Markdown format is supported...

info_section.title: Script Information
info_section.prerelease_tooltip: Set as prerelease version, stable version will not update to this version. You can enable prerelease installation link in script management page

library_section.title: Library Description
library_section.description_placeholder: Please describe the purpose and functionality of this library...

changelog_section.title: Changelog
changelog_section.placeholder:
e.g.:
• Fixed a known issue
• Added a new feature
• Optimized performance
• Updated dependencies

version.load_failed_description: Error occurred while fetching version list, please refresh and try again
version.history_description: View all published versions, including stable and prerelease versions. You can install any version or view its source code.
version.no_history_description: This script has not published any versions yet
version.confirm_delete_description: Are you sure you want to delete this version? This action cannot be undone.
version.changelog_placeholder:
e.g.:
✨ New Feature: Added UI optimization
🐛 Bug Fix: Resolved browser compatibility issues
⚡ Performance: Optimized script execution speed
📦 Dependencies: Updated to latest version
version.version_type_extra: Prerelease versions are usually for testing new features and may not be stable

sync.title: Source Code Sync
sync.description: Configure script source code synchronization, supporting automatic or manual sync from code hosting platforms like GitHub, GitLab, etc.
sync.sync_mode_auto: Auto Sync - Periodically check for updates and sync automatically, you can also set up Webhook triggers
sync.sync_mode_manual: Manual Sync - Only sync when manually clicked
sync.content_url_description: Optional: Sync script README or documentation, supports Markdown format
sync.sync_success: Sync configuration saved and synced successfully
sync.sync_failed: Sync failed, please check network connection or URL correctness

access.title: Access Control
access.description: Manage user and user group access permissions for this script, including role assignment and permission expiration settings
access.update_failed: Update failed, please try again later
access.delete_confirm_content: Confirm to delete access permission for {entityType} "{itemName}"? This action cannot be undone.
access.delete_failed: Delete failed, please try again later

empty.title: No users or user groups with access permissions

logs.title: Management Logs
logs.description: Log management feature is under development, stay tuned.

groups.title: Group Management
groups.description: Manage script user group permissions, control access levels for different users
groups.group_description_placeholder: Please describe the purpose and permission scope of this user group in detail
groups.delete_confirm_description: After deletion, all members of this user group will lose related permissions. This action cannot be recovered
groups.remove_member_confirm_description: After removal, this user will lose access permissions

library_info.title: Library Information Settings
library_info.description: Configure basic information for the script library, including name, description, etc.

public_settings.title: Script Visibility Settings
public_settings.description: Configure script visibility status, determining script visibility and access permissions.
public_settings.visibility_private: Script is private, only visible to you
public_settings.visibility_unlisted: Script is unlisted, accessible only via direct link
public_settings.visibility_public: Script is public, all users can view and install
public_settings.unwell_checkbox: Mark as potentially containing inappropriate content
public_settings.unwell_description: This website may contain disturbing content, including but not limited to frequent red-blue flashing lights, content harmful to vision or mental health.

script_management.title: Script Management
script_management.archive_description: After archiving, the script will no longer support updates and users cannot provide feedback, but it can still be used
script_management.unarchive_description: Script is archived, click to unarchive
script_management.delete_warning: All data will be unrecoverable after deleting the script, please operate with caution!

confirmations.archive_confirm_content: After archiving, the script will no longer support updates and users cannot provide feedback, but it can still be used.
confirmations.unarchive_confirm_content: After unarchiving, the script can receive user feedback and other information.
confirmations.delete_confirm_content: All data will be unrecoverable after deleting the script, please operate with caution!

invite.confirm_delete_invite: Are you sure you want to delete this invite code?
invite.delete_failed: Delete failed, please try again later
invite.check_invite_link: Please check if the invite link is correct
invite.operation_failed_retry: Operation failed, please try again later
invite.permission_after_join: After joining, you will have the following permissions:

publish.manage_prerelease_and_gray_strategy: Manage script prerelease and gray release strategies
publish.prerelease_description_part1: When prerelease is enabled, versions that comply with
publish.prerelease_description_part2: will be automatically marked as prerelease versions when updating scripts, and prerelease version install buttons will be provided on the script homepage.
publish.prerelease_first_enable_tip: (First time enabling will add three strategies: prerelease users update to all latest, stable releases gradually update to latest stable version by weight over 10 days, other users update to previous stable version)
publish.gray_strategy_description: Configure certain strategies (strategies have priority order) to make your script users update to specified versions
publish.load_gray_config_failed: Failed to load gray release configuration:
publish.save_gray_strategy_failed: Failed to save gray release strategy:

error.500_subtitle: Sorry, our server encountered some problems
error.500_description: Our server is temporarily unable to process your request. We have received the error report and are working hard to fix this issue.
error.404_subtitle: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist
error.404_description: Please check if the URL is correct, or start browsing from the homepage.
error.403_subtitle: Sorry, you do not have permission to access this page
error.403_description: Please contact the administrator for access permission, or check your login status.
error.feedback_notice: Please provide the above error ID and error code when providing feedback, this will help us locate and resolve the issue faster.
error.feedback_description: If the problem persists, please provide feedback through the following methods:
error.server_error_details: The server encountered an internal error while processing your request. This may be due to high server load, database connection issues, or other technical failures.

user.avatar_format_error: Only JPG/PNG format images are supported!
user.avatar_help_text: Supports JPG, PNG formats, file size no more than 1MB
user.email_validation: Please enter a valid email address

favorites.no_favorites: This user hasn't favorited any scripts yet
favorites.no_scripts_in_category: No favorite scripts in this category
favorites.folder_not_found_description: The folder you are looking for does not exist or has been deleted
favorites.folder_error: Folder does not exist or has been deleted
favorites.no_script_manager_content: ScriptCat extension is not detected in your browser, confirm to open subscription link?

edit_modal.title: Edit Folder
edit_modal.name_length_error: Folder name should be 1-50 characters long
edit_modal.private_help_text: When enabled, only you can see this folder

settings.settings_description: Manage your account preferences, including Webhook configuration and notification options

webhook.settings_description: Use Webhook to receive messages from Github and other places. Configure update URL in script management on the script page to achieve automatic and instant script updates.
webhook.config_tip_description: Please follow the steps below to complete Webhook configuration to ensure scripts can sync correctly with your code repository.
webhook.step_bind_repo_desc: Visit Github repository and go to Settings
webhook.step_config_webhook_detail: Configure the following Webhook address and secret in your code repository
webhook.step_select_events_desc: Select the event types to listen for:
webhook.event_push_desc: Trigger sync when code is pushed
webhook.event_release_desc: Trigger sync when new version is released
webhook.event_tag_desc: Trigger sync when tags are created
webhook.confirm_refresh_content: After refreshing, the old secret will become invalid, please update your Webhook configuration promptly
webhook.security_tip_content: Please keep your Secret key safe and do not leak it to others. If you suspect the key has been compromised, please refresh it immediately.

notification_settings.notification_settings_description: Customize your email notification preferences to stay informed about important script-related activities and interactions.
notification_settings.mention_notification_description: Send email notification when users mention me in comments or feedback
notification_settings.score_notification_description: Send notification when my scripts receive new ratings
notification_settings.create_script_notification_description: Send notification when followed users create scripts
notification_settings.script_update_notification_description: Send notification when scripts I follow have new version updates
notification_settings.script_issue_notification_description: Send notification when scripts I follow receive new issue feedback
notification_settings.script_issue_comment_notification_descri: Send notification when feedback I follow has new replies
notification_settings.email_notification_info_item_1: All notifications will be sent to your registered email
notification_settings.email_notification_info_item_2: You can modify these notification settings at any time
notification_settings.email_notification_info_item_3: Important system notifications (such as security-related) cannot be disabled
notification_settings.email_notification_info_item_4: Notification emails may be classified as spam, please check carefully
